Long Forgotten Earth

v0.14

Introduction

Long Forgotten Earth (aka LFE) is a RPG game in a first person view. The game is base on Space exploration, on a large spaceship, in a realistic univers, with numerous planets, NPC and quests.

Classes

LFE is known to compile under Windows XP using Microsoft Visual C++ 6.0. The game use the following 3rd party libraries: TinyXML, libnoise, stargen.

Contact

The game website is GitHub and maintained by Sphinkie
